changeSet.author: ypashynskyi
changeSet.sql: update pm_review r set properties = jsonb_set(properties #- '{how_archieved}', '{how_achieved}', properties #> '{how_archieved}') where r.properties ->> 'how_archieved' = '{how_archieved}';

rollback.sql: update pm_review r set properties = jsonb_set(properties #- '{how_achieved}', '{how_archieved}', properties #> '{how_achieved}') where r.properties ->> 'how_achieved' = '{how_achieved}';
